meanings.sent1: I preconize the new book to all my friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher preconizes hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent3: At the party, I preconize the delicious cake everyone should try.
meanings.sent4: Her actions preconize her as a true leader in the community.
meanings.sent5: The mayor preconizes the importance of community involvement.

meanings.definition: To officially announce or declare as worthy of recognition
meanings.sent1: The company will preconize the employee of the month soon.
meanings.sent2: The president preconizes the national heroes every year.
meanings.sent3: The cat preconizes itself as the ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun preconizes the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The shining trophy preconizes excellence in sports.
